Building a modular, affordable housing complex with on-site resources such as job training, mental health services, and childcare.
Creating a mobile app that connects homeless individuals with local resources, such as food banks, shelters, and job opportunities.
Developing a microfinance program that provides small loans to homeless individuals to start their own businesses or improve their living conditions.
Creating a community garden program that provides fresh produce to homeless individuals and teaches them sustainable farming techniques.
Developing a job training program that teaches homeless individuals skills in demand by local employers, such as construction or hospitality.
